text: nim'ma hindina janāṅgagaḷalli, bhūmiyalli aśāntiyannu mereyadante janarannu taḍeyuva sajjanaru (doḍḍa saṅkhyeyalli) irabēkittu. Ādare antaha kēvala kelavaru mātra iddaru. Nāvu avarannu avarinda (duṣṭarinda) rakṣisidevu. Akramigaḷu tamage nīḍalāgidda sukha bhōgagaḷa hindeyē biddiddaru. Avaru aparādhigaḷāgiddaru
